publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-476 Ian McKee: England Football Team Successâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the England football team on its fine win over Russia; wishes it every success in qualifying for the finals of the European championship in 2008, and strongly supports its right, along with the national team of Scotland, to compete in future Olympic competitions. Supported by: Aileen Campbell*, Christine Grahame*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christopher Harvie*, Keith Brown*
S3M-476 England Football Team Success (lodged on 14 September 2007) Bashir Ahmad*
S3M-476 England Football Team Success (lodged on 14 September 2007) Bill Wilson*
S3M-476 England Football Team Success (lodged on 14 September 2007) Angela Constance*
